WorkItem.Description: Could anyone tell me if it would be possible to Group specified rows so that they can be toggled visible and invisible by the user, This is usually done by using a plus sign that appears to the left of the grouped cells, so they can be toggled. If this is not possible, would it be difficult to implement? This is the only feature I still need.

Comments.Message: Thats fantastic. Thank You for your help. I have just tried Grouping a Row and it works as expected. Could you tell me if it is possible to do this for a range of rows, like in the groups example excel file? J
Can you show me the solution for this problem. ASAP. Thanks
